Page Title: SCATSAT-1 | Meteorological & Oceanographic Satellite Data Archival Centre
Text Content: Scatsat-1 was launched by PSLV-C35 from Satish Dhawan Space Centre, Sriharikota on September 26, 2016. It carries the Ku-band Pencil Beam scatterometer (SCAT) payload developed by SAC-ISRO.
